products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: When you want something decidedly neutral and contemporary, this handsome design will work perfectly. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle dcor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice. A high-quality finish that is flame retardant; boheme pvc blackout stone grey roller blind is crafted out of a special blackout fabric so light won't travel into your room when closed.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Azure Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Aloe Green Roller Blind
products.description: Isla pvc blackout aloe green double-sided roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer. With a textured leafy design, its ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room. The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla pvc blackout aloe green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Sorbet Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Bring a splash of soft colour into your room of choice with isla pvc blackout sorbet pink, an adorably pastel pink roller blind with a subtle double-sided leafy design that instantly draws the eye without overpowering. Perfect in a pale or neutral room, its delicate style will stand the test of time. With a blackout fabric present in the blind, it keeps daylight out when you want it to and the flame-retardant finish is a useful safety feature.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Marina Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Smart and timeless, isla pvc blackout marina grey roller blind gives you an air of refined sophistication wherever you choose to feature it. With a double-sided pattern consisting of gently curving leaves in a variety of different sizes, it provides a subtle focal point in your room of choice. The isla marina uses a special blackout material, ideal for shutting out the daylight when you need to and its flame retardant for extra safety.

products.title: Basix Blackout Shale Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This medium grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.

Product id: sdb-vtb1376 fabric colour: classic blue material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes bella blackout classic blue 89mm vertical blind in blue.
